function NPC_603101:Init( NPCID ) --[[ USERDATA 1 : Pain패턴을 보이기 위한 데미지 누적 2 : 머리 파츠 데미지 누적 3 : 왼손톱 파츠 데미지 누적 4 : 오른손톱 파츠 데미지 누적 --]]
NPC_603101.UD_DATASIZE = 5
NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, NPC_603101.UD_DATASIZE )
NPC_603101.DataIdxForPain = 1 NPC_603101.DataIdxForHorn = 2 NPC_603101.DataIdxForLeftNail = 3 NPC_603101.DataIdxForRightNail = 4
NPC_603101.PartIdxForHorn = 1 NPC_603101.PartIdxForRightNail = 2 NPC_603101.PartIdxForLeftNail = 3 NPC_603101.PartIdxForPain = 5
NPC_603101.LimitForPain = NPC_603101.MaxHP * 0.15 NPC_603101.LimitForBreakNail = NPC_603101.MaxHP * 0.2 NPC_603101.LimitForBreakHorn = NPC_603101.MaxHP * 0.1
NPC_603101.TalIdPain1 = 260300103 NPC_603101.TalIdPain2 = 260300104
NPC_603101.TalIdRage = 260300103
NPC_603101.TalIdLeftClawAttack = 260300111 NPC_603101.TalIdLeftHandAttack = 260300141
NPC_603101.TalIdSlidingClawAttack = 260300121 NPC_603101.TalIdSlidingHandAttack = 260300122
NPC_603101.TalIdSlidingClawAttackFast = 260300160 NPC_603101.TalIdSlidingHandAttackFast = 260300161
NPC_603101.BuffIdRage = 40171 NPC_603101.BuffIdStackingRage = 40173 end
function NPC_603101:OnCombatBegin() this:SummonNow( 600000, this:GetField():GetMarkerPos(10000) ) end
function NPC_603101:OnCombatEnd() this:RemoveAllBuff() end
function NPC_603101:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, NPC_603101.UD_DATASIZE do this:SetUserData( i, 0) end -- for end
function NPC_603101:LeftHandAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:CheckBPart(3) then -- 손톱이 없으면 손으로 때리고 ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_603101.TalIdLeftHandAttack, Enemy ) else -- 손톱이 있으면 손톱으로 긁는다. ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_603101.TalIdLeftClawAttack, Enemy ) end end
-- 비바 전용 패턴 function NPC_603101:SlidingAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 1 and math.random(0,1) == 0 then if ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) then -- 손톱이 없으면 손으로 때리고 ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_603101.TalIdSlidingHandAttackFast, Enemy ) else -- 손톱이 있으면 손톱으로 긁는다. ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_603101.TalIdSlidingClawAttackFast, Enemy ) end else if ThisNPC:CheckBPart(2) then -- 손톱이 없으면 손으로 때리고 ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_603101.TalIdSlidingHandAttack, Enemy ) else -- 손톱이 있으면 손톱으로 긁는다. ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_603101.TalIdSlidingClawAttack, Enemy ) end end end
function NPC_603101:StackUpRage( ThisNPC, Enemy ) ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_603101.BuffIdStackingRage ) -- mode2 victory talent(260300144)에서 버프를 삭제한다. end
function NPC_603101:OnFinishAndAggroShort( ThisActor, Enemy ) AsNPC(ThisActor):Aggro( "random", 0 ) end
function NPC_603101:AccDamage( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) -- Acc damage parts if PartsIdx <= 3 then if NPC_603101:AccDamageForBreakPart( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) then return HitInfo end end
return NPC_603101:AccDamageForPain( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_603101:AccDamageForPain( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) if ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_603101.TalIdRage then return end
local DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForPain ) + HitInfo.Damage
if DmgAcc < NPC_603101.LimitForPain then ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForPain, DmgAcc ) return end
if ( not ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) ) or ( ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_603101.TalIdPain1 ) ) then return end
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_603101.TalIdPain1 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForPain, 0 )
return end
function NPC_603101:AccDamageForBreakPart( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) --GLog( "AccDamageForBreakPart : (" .. PartsIdx ..")\n" )
if ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_603101.TalIdRage or -- 분노 탤런트중이거나 ThisNPC:CheckBPart( PartsIdx ) then -- 파츠가 뽀개져 있거나 return false end
-- 데미지 누적 체크 local DmgAcc = 0 if PartsIdx == NPC_603101.PartIdxForHorn then -- 뿔 DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForHorn ) + HitInfo.Damage if DmgAcc < NPC_603101.LimitForBreakHorn then ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForHorn, DmgAcc ) return false end end
if PartsIdx == NPC_603101.PartIdxForRightNail then -- 오른손톱 DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForRightNail ) + HitInfo.Damage if DmgAcc < NPC_603101.LimitForBreakNail then ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForRightNail, DmgAcc ) return false end end
if PartsIdx == NPC_603101.PartIdxForLeftNail then -- 왼손톱 DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForLeftNail ) + HitInfo.Damage if DmgAcc < NPC_603101.LimitForBreakNail then ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForLeftNail, DmgAcc ) return false end end
--GLog( "Prepare BreakPart\n" ) -- 파괴로직 -- 모션이 쿨타임중만 아니라면 파츠를 파괴한다. if PartsIdx == NPC_603101.PartIdxForHorn then if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_603101.TalIdPain1 ) then return false end
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_603101.TalIdPain1 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( PartsIdx, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForHorn, 0 )
-- 그로기 상태가 너무자주 노출되지 않도록 글로벌 Pain의 누적수치를 리셋한다. ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForPain, 0 )
return true elseif PartsIdx == NPC_603101.PartIdxForRightNail then if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_603101.TalIdPain2 ) then return false end
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_603101.TalIdPain2 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( PartsIdx, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForRightNail, 0 )
-- 그로기 상태가 너무자주 노출되지 않도록 글로벌 Pain의 누적수치를 리셋한다. ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForPain, 0 )
return true
elseif PartsIdx == NPC_603101.PartIdxForLeftNail then if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_603101.TalIdPain2 ) then return false end
ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_603101.TalIdPain2 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( PartsIdx, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForLeftNail, 0 )
-- 그로기 상태가 너무자주 노출되지 않도록 글로벌 Pain의 누적수치를 리셋한다. ThisNPC:SetUserData( NPC_603101.DataIdxForPain, 0 )
return true end
return false end
